languages.text: Неуважение к Лорд-капитану есть непростительная оплошность, пусть даже {mf|он|она} предстает хоть трижды в лохмотьях перед своими блюстителями. Вы отдаете приказ — и дюжина сервочерепов разлетается по отсекам нижних палуб, неся ваш карательный приговор. И пока вы совершаете свое восхождение к капитанскому мостику, несколько сотен блюстителей загоняют в пустой отсек, оборудованный лишь механической "тысячеглавой" виселицей. Один поворот тумблера — и все они принимают наказание, как того и заслуживают.

traits.locale_text: Неуважение к Лорд-капитану есть непростительная оплошность, пусть даже {mf|он|она} предстает хоть трижды в лохмотьях перед своими блюстителями. Вы отдаете приказ — и дюжина сервочерепов разлетается по отсекам нижних палуб, неся ваш карательный приговор. И пока вы совершаете свое восхождение к капитанскому мостику, несколько сотен блюстителей загоняют в пустой отсек, оборудованный лишь механической "тысячеглавой" виселицей. Один поворот тумблера — и все они принимают наказание, как того и заслуживают.

languages.text: Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

languages.text: 对领主舰长不敬是不可原谅的疏忽，即使{mf|他|她}衣衫褴褛地出现在{mf|他的|她的}仆人面前。当你下达命令之后，十几颗伺服头骨飞走了，将行商浪人严厉的判决送到了底层甲板。当行商浪人登上舰桥的时候，几百名执法者已经被赶到了船舱里，里面只有一个可以同时绞死一千个人的机械绞架。只要按下开关，所有下层甲板的执法者都将得到他们应有的惩罚。
languages.original_text: Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

traits.locale_text: 对领主舰长不敬是不可原谅的疏忽，即使{mf|他|她}衣衫褴褛地出现在{mf|他的|她的}仆人面前。当你下达命令之后，十几颗伺服头骨飞走了，将行商浪人严厉的判决送到了底层甲板。当行商浪人登上舰桥的时候，几百名镇压者已经被赶到了船舱里，里面只有一个可以同时绞死一千个人的机械绞架。只要按下开关，所有下层甲板的镇压者都将得到他们应有的惩罚。

languages.text: たとえ{mf|彼|彼女}がボロ布を着て召使いたちの前に立ったとしても、ロード・キャプテンに対して無礼を示すことは許しがたい過ちである。命令を下すと、十数人のサーヴォスカルが下甲板のコンパートメントに散らばり、懲罰的評決を実行する。そして、あなたがヴォイドシップのブリッジに登っている間、数百人の執行官たちが、機械仕掛けの「千人吊るし」の絞首台のみが備えられている空の区画に押し込まれる。スイッチを一回転させれば、全員が相応の罰を受ける。
languages.original_text: Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

traits.locale_text: たとえ{mf|彼|彼女}がボロ布を着て召使いたちの前に立ったとしても、ロード・キャプテンに対して無礼を示すことは許しがたい過ちである。命令を下すと、十数人のサーヴォスカルが下甲板のコンパートメントに散らばり、懲罰的評決を実行する。そして、あなたがヴォイドシップのブリッジに登っている間、数百人の執行官たちが、機械仕掛けの「千人吊るし」の絞首台のみが備えられている空の区画に押し込まれる。スイッチを一回転させれば、全員が相応の罰を受ける。

languages.text: Faltarle al respeto {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán es un descuido imperdonable, aunque aparezca en harapos ante sus sirvientes. Al dar la orden, una docena de servocráneos se dispersan por los compartimentos de las cubiertas inferiores, cumpliendo el veredicto castigador. Mientras asciendes al puente de mando de la nave del vacío, varios centenares de miembros del personal de seguridad son conducidos a un compartimento vacío, equipado únicamente con una horca mecánica de «mil cabezas». Un giro del interruptor y todos recibirán el castigo que merecen.
languages.original_text: Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

traits.locale_text: Faltarle al respeto {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán es un descuido imperdonable, aunque aparezca en harapos ante sus sirvientes. Al dar la orden, una docena de servocráneos se dispersan por los compartimentos de las cubiertas inferiores, cumpliendo el veredicto castigador. Mientras asciendes al puente de mando de la nave del vacío, varios centenares de miembros del personal de seguridad son conducidos a un compartimento vacío, equipado únicamente con una horca mecánica de «mil cabezas». Un giro del interruptor y todos recibirán el castigo que merecen.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Respektlosigkeit dem Lord Captain gegenüber ist ein unverzeihlicher Fehler, auch wenn dieser in Lumpen vor seinen Dienern erscheint. Du erteilst den Befehl, und ein Dutzend Servoschädel huschen durch die Module der Unterdecks und vollstrecken dein Strafurteil. Und während du dich zurück auf die Brücke des Raumschiffs begibst, werden mehrere hundert Enforcers in ein leeres Modul getrieben, das nur mit einem mechanischen "tausendköpfigen" Galgen ausgestattet ist. Ein Knopfdruck und sie alle bekommen die Strafe, die sie verdient haben.
languages.original_text: Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

traits.locale_text: Respektlosigkeit dem Lord Captain gegenüber ist ein unverzeihlicher Fehler, auch wenn dieser in Lumpen vor seinen Dienern erscheint. Du erteilst den Befehl, und ein Dutzend Servoschädel huschen durch die Module der Unterdecks und vollstrecken dein Strafurteil. Und während du dich zurück auf die Brücke des Raumschiffs begibst, werden mehrere hundert Enforcers in ein leeres Modul getrieben, das nur mit einem mechanischen "tausendköpfigen" Galgen ausgestattet ist. Ein Knopfdruck und sie alle bekommen die Strafe, die sie verdient haben.

languages.text: Manquer de respect envers {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} constitue une négligence impardonnable, même {mf|s'il|si elle} apparaît en haillons devant ses serviteurs. Un mot de votre part, et une douzaine de servocrânes se dispersent sur les ponts inférieurs pour exécuter votre sentence. Tandis que vous remontez vers la passerelle du vaisseau, plusieurs centaines de prévôts sont parqués dans un compartiment vide équipé en tout et pour tout d'une potence mécanique à « mille têtes ». Le mécanisme activé, ils reçoivent tous le châtiment qu'ils méritent.
languages.original_text: Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.

Un mot de votre part, et une douzaine de servo-crânes se dispersent sur les ponts inférieurs pour exécuter votre sentence. Tandis que vous remontez vers la passerelle du vaisseau, plusieurs centaines de prévôts sont parqués dans un compartiment vide équipé en tout et pour tout d'une potence mécanique à « mille têtes ». Le mécanisme activé, ils reçoivent tous le châtiment qu'ils méritent.

languages.text: Paçavralar içinde olsa dahi Lord Kaptan'a saygısızlık, affı olmayan bir hatadır. Emir vermen üzerine on kadar hizmelet, alt güvertelerin bölmelerine dağılarak cezai hükmünü yerine getiriyor. Sen uçsuz gemisi köprüsüne doğru çıkarken yüzlerce infazcı; içinde sadece mekanik bir "bin başlı" darağacı olan, boş bir bölmeye sürülüyor. Düğmeye basılmasıyla hepsi, hak ettikleri cezayı alıyor.
languages.original_text: Showing disrespect to the Lord Captain is an unforgivable oversight, even if {mf|he|she} appears in rags before {mf|his|her} servants. You give the order, and a dozen servo-skulls scatter across the compartments of the lower decks, carrying out your punitive verdict. And while you make your ascent to the voidship's bridge, several hundred enforcers are driven into an empty compartment, equipped only with a mechanical "thousand-headed" gallows. One turn of the switch, and they all receive the punishment they deserve.
